newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Donaghys buys Feltex Industrial Textiles.
newsitem.headline: Donaghys buys Feltex Industrial Textiles.

text.p: Donaghys Industries Ltd, a wholly owned subsidiary of Donaghys Ltd, said on Monday it had acquired Auckland-based Feltex Industrial Textiles.
The ownership becomes effective on November 15.
Donaghys said market forces had necessitated rationalisation with the New Zealand narrow fabrics industry.
"Manufacturers have been suffering from excess capacity for some time and this was the major driving force behind the agreement," it said.
Donaghys would operate the business from its present site in Auckland for the interim but planned to integrate it with its own webbing and braid business in due course.
The company said the new consolidated webbing and braids business would double its capacity in these product categories.
